attributes.action: Urge Kent County Council (K.C.C) to reinstate Mr Robert Hughes (Bob) as the serving Community warden for Aldington, Brabourne, Mersham, Sevington and Smeeth.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Robert Hughes (Bob) took the position of being our Community Warden in March 2008, after serving in the Metropolitan Police for 33 years. Everyone was so pleased to have an experienced ex-police inspector as the Community Warden serving our area. Over the past few months Bob has been "A visual figure" around all the villages, and I don't mean driving around in a car. Bob has been walking around getting to know residents and DOING A GREAT JOB! Bob has even helped Aldington raise £10,000 for two local charities. So it came as a huge shock to learn that K.C.C has decided to terminate Bob's contract with them. We all say "BRING BACK BOB".

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
